text:
Tomcat is supposed to create this file according to the Apache_tomcat HOWTO 
document.  I need this to allow Apache 2.0.35 to serve the static content of my 
pages.  According to forums on Jguru there is a new Mod_webapp file to use but 
there is no documentation in this regard or on exactly how to do this 
configuration
creator: shaunbotha@mweb.co.za
william.barker@wilshire.com
text:
You need to enable ApacheConfig in your server.xml.  This is documented at:
<<http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/tomcat-4.0-doc/config/ajp.html#Using%
20ApacheConfig>>
